description:
And now they do have a chance after this great win against West Ham, and I have to say that they deserved it. But yes, some really good games, some good talking points as well. And in the English Premier League, Arsenal, we've mentioned it, tightened their grip on a place in the Premier League's top four by beating Liverpool 4-1. And they inflicted damage on their opponents Champions League aspirations in the Emirates Stadium. But a lot of the spotlight before the game centred on that man Raheem Sterling. In an exclusive interview with the BBC, the forward confirmed he turned down a contract worth around $150,000 and led him being criticised by pundits by fans and journalists. But is this the case of "too much, too soon"? Do we expect too much from our young Premier League stars? Joining me on my Sportsworld panel was the former Liverpool defender Stephane Henchoz, who told me it was a shock to hear Sterling being so outspoken about his future.
